pr_title: fix bug #819: [BUG] [Service] [getPattern] Week info("firstDayOfWeek" &"weekendOfRange") should also follow CLDR data

timeline.message: Correct firstDayOfWeek's value with cldr data
Correct weekendRange's value with cldr data
Convert day string to index number
add logic of supplementing default region for locales without region
fix CI failure problem: add header in new added file DayEnum

timeline.bodyText: recommend the method name firstDayExtract to getFirstDayExtract
timeline.author: tigershi

replies.bodyText: Just for keep code style consistent with previous code, but it really doesn't conform the naming convention, so rename it to 'extractFirstDay'.
replies.author: huihuiw01

timeline.bodyText: recommend the method name weekendRangeExtract to getWeekendRangeExtract
timeline.author: tigershi

replies.bodyText: Just for keep code style consistent with previous code, but it really doesn't conform the naming convention, so rename it to 'extractWeekendRange'.
replies.author: huihuiw01

timeline.bodyText: I remember there is an existing method to get the default region of a locale. Could you check?
timeline.author: Xiaochao8

replies.bodyText: Confirmed with @chaoq0318, there is no such method.
replies.author: huihuiw01

timeline.message: rename some methods' names according to review comment

timeline.author: Xiaochao8

replies.bodyText:
As I confirmed with @chaoq0318 and we synced yesterday, this method is not appropriate due to it use the extracted data and is used for calling by L2 API, so not appropriate to be used in the extracting process.
I find another method which can be used here, and change code accordingly.
replies.author: huihuiw01

timeline.bodyText: Why add weekend range. How does this relate to the first day of week?
timeline.author: Xiaochao8

replies.bodyText:
As weekend range has the same bug, and need similar code change, so I fix them together.
I have asked @nannany00 include weekend range problem in the issue #819, and change PR title accordingly.
replies.author: huihuiw01

timeline.message: fix review comment: use existed method to get region of a locale
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:vmware/singleton into master_#819
